description:
Gravity Autos is a 10 rooftop Auto Group based in Atlanta, GA selling close to 15,000 cars per year and growing! We have the inventory, the management support, technology, and every tool a sales pro needs to hit the ground running.

Are you looking for a chance to take your retail automotive career to the next level? The opportunity is here! We are looking for people to grow with us as we are planning a major expansion in the Midwest in 2024. We are looking for people ready to move into management as we are opening 3 more Gravity stores in the midwest very soon.

This job is for experienced sales professionals looking to move up and you will be coached, developed, and compensated as such. We invest in the best because we expect the best out of our people. Gravity Autos has always grown its leaders from inside the company, we have multiple General Managers who started on the sales floor with us.

This is not an entry level position or a position for someone looking to park themselves behind a sales tower.

Your Responsibilities & Essential Job Duties:
• Assisting customers via phone, internet, and in person.
• Leading the floor in vehicles sold.
• Learning our inventory as well as mastering the cars that we specialize in.
• Ability to master and follow a simple process designed to value your time as well as the clients time.
• Expert level CRM knowledge.
• Intermediate or higher computer skills.
• Ability to learn and master supervisory duties as assigned by management.
• Ability to learn fast and think on your feet.

Job Requirements & Qualifications:
• High school diploma or equivalent preferred
• Must have a valid Driver’s License
• Minimum 5 years experience in a franchise or large independent dealer in the Chicago Market.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $60,000.00 - $140,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• Company car
• Dental insurance
• Employee assistance program
• Employee discount
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Professional development assistance
• Vision insurance

Compensation package:
• Bonus opportunities
• Monthly bonus
• Performance bonus
• Signing bonus
• Uncapped commission
• Yearly bonus

Schedule:
• 12 hour shift
• 8 hour shift
• Day shift
• Monday to Friday

Application Question(s):
• What makes you THE person for the job?

Experience:
• Automotive Sales: 3 years (Required)

Ability to Relocate:
• Highland Park, IL 60035: Relocate before starting work (Required)

Work Location: In person
